snippet.title: Slashback: Cradle, Indiscriminancy, Multiplicity
snippet.description: Slashback tonight with a few updates and reactions to recent Slashdot stories, including notes on Google News, eco-friendly architecture, and Kryptonite's vulnerable bike locks. Read on for the details, below.

snippet.title: Text Messages in the Courts
snippet.description: KennyG944 noted a story running on CNN which talks about Text Messages being used in the Kobe Bryant trial. This raises a host of issues about the phone company keeping these messages around and expectations of privacy.
